definition: Liao and Jin dynasties, namely: Liao or Khitan dynasty (907-1125) and Jurchen Jin dynasty (1115-1234)
short name for Liaoning 遼寧|辽宁[Liao2 ning2] province/Liao or Khitan dynasty (907-1125)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Galerkin's method is used to discrete the equations.
sentences.chinese: 利用伽遼金方法對動力學方程進行了離散。

sentences.english: Then the finite element formulae of this problem are obtained from Galerkin′s method.
sentences.chinese: 然後應用伽遼金法導出了這一問題的有限元計算公式。

sentences.english: The scaling functions are used as basis functions to construct the wavelet Galerkin finite element method.
sentences.chinese: 利用尺度函數作爲基函數得到了小波伽遼金有限元法。

sentences.english: "Qiushan" deer vein was the silk pattern with northern features in the Jinliaoyuaan period.
sentences.chinese: “秋山”鹿紋是遼金元時期具有北方特色的絲綢紋樣。
